organic_results.title: Educational" choice": Its appeal may be illusory
organic_results.snippet: One of the central features of Pres-ident Bush's Project 2000 plan for rejuvenating this country's educational system is the concept of" choice." Originally a pet idea of conservatives because it attempts to apply" free market" principles to our public schools, choice is now being seriously considered by policymakers on both sides of the political spectrum. What is choice? Would it really improve the schools? What are its possible risks? The basic idea behind choice is to change the manner in which tax revenues are used to finance primary …
